name: Block Out HD
description:
Jump into the world of Block Out (Brickshooter) - a challenging turn-based block game in Match 3 genre game. Drop blocks in dom. Create group of 3,4 or even more blocks of one color on a field to destroy locked blocks and go through new levels.

Run through the number of challenging levels.
Explore the borders of your mind while running through the twists of luck and logic.

Brick game bonuses:
Fast Block Out - locked only blocks destroy until level end.
Total Block Out - clean field at level end.
Combo - consequent destroy of locked blocks.

Family support: filter sensitive ads.
A new Match3 unblock locked blocks game.

Good luck! Unblock and win!
